1370: Cesarius was born in Cromme straet in 1370.
Got married to Hildegardis at age 23 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Ghela, at age 23.
1371: Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Imsoete, at age 24.
1372: Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Riet, at age 25.
Lost daughter Imsoete when Imsoete was 2 years old.
1374: Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Oda, at age 27.
1375: Had a son with Hildegardis, Heinone, at age 28.
1376: Had a son with Hildegardis, Firiin, at age 29.
1378: Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Hodine, at age 31.
1379: Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Salome, at age 32.
1382: Lost son Wicghard when Wicghard was 0 years old.
Hildegardis gave birth to their stillborn son Wicghard in 1382.
1384: Had a daughter with Hildegardis, Sywi, at age 37.
1385: Lost daughter Oda when Oda was 12 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
